results.title: Exploring effects of Simvastatin on coagulation mediators to alleviate the advancement of high cholesterol diet triggered neurodegeneration.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ demonstrated reduced @<m>DISEASE_Thrombophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019851 @@@hypercoagulation@@@, enhanced fibrinolysis and reversed @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@ in HCD exposed @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ suggesting its potential role in preventing the progression of @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@ in @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@.

citations.NLM: Khan S, Hasan N, Khan S, Akhtar M, Akhtar M, Najmi AK. Exploring effects of Simvastatin on coagulation mediators to alleviate the advancement of high cholesterol diet triggered neurodegeneration. J Biochem Mol Toxicol. 2023 Mar 29;():e23342. PMID: 36992618
citations.BibTeX: @article{36992618, title={Exploring effects of Simvastatin on coagulation mediators to alleviate the advancement of high cholesterol diet triggered neurodegeneration.}, author={Khan S and Hasan N and Khan S and Akhtar M and Akhtar M and Najmi AK}, journal={J Biochem Mol Toxicol}, pages={e23342}}

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates vascular hypercoagulability in cardiac transplant recipients.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates vascular @<m>DISEASE_Thrombophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019851 @@@hypercoagulability@@@ in cardiac transplant recipients.

citations.NLM: Hölschermann H, Hilgendorff A, Kemkes-Matthes B, Schönburg M, Bauer EP, Tillmanns H, Haberbosch W. Simvastatin attenuates vascular hypercoagulability in cardiac transplant recipients. Transplantation. 2000 May 15;69(9):1830-6. PMID: 10830219

results.title: Lipid-lowering therapy corrects endothelial cell dysfunction in a short time but does not affect hypercoagulable state even after long-term use in hyperlipidemic patients.
results.text_hl: We prospectively investigated the effects of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ reduction using @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Thrombophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019851 @@@hypercoagulability@@@ found in hyperlipidemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Kario K, Matsuo T, Hoshide S, Kobayashi H, Sakata T, Mizuno O, Mitsuhashi T, Ikeda U, Miyata T, Shimada K. Lipid-lowering therapy corrects endothelial cell dysfunction in a short time but does not affect hypercoagulable state even after long-term use in hyperlipidemic patients. Blood Coagul Fibrinolysis. 1999 Jul;10(5):269-76. PMID: 10456618

results.title: Renal failure caused by a partly calcified aortic aneurysm in a patient with dabigatran therapy
results.text_hl: Neither @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@ event nor @DISEASE_Aneurysm_Ruptured @DISEASE_MESH:D017542 @@@aneurysm rupture@@@ occurred with the adapted antihypertensive therapy, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@.

citations.NLM: Jud P, Gary T, Tiesenhausen K, Portugaller R, Hackl G, Brodmann M. Renal failure caused by a partly calcified aortic aneurysm in a patient with dabigatran therapy Medicine (Baltimore). 2017 Apr;96(17):e6789. PMID: 28445318

results.title: Effects of lipid-lowering treatment on circulating microparticles in patients with diabetes mellitus and chronic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ stages 3-4 had elevated PMPs, EMPs and MMPs compared with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with normal GFR. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduced procoagulant MPs, MMPs and PMPs in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@-@DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, suggesting a beneficial reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019851 @@@hypercoagulability@@@ in this high-risk @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Almquist T, Mobarrez F, Jacobson SH, Wallén H, Hjemdahl P. Effects of lipid-lowering treatment on circulating microparticles in patients with diabetes mellitus and chronic kidney disease. Nephrol Dial Transplant. 2016 Jun;31(6):944-52. PMID: 26394646
citations.BibTeX: @article{26394646, title={Effects of lipid-lowering treatment on circulating microparticles in patients with diabetes mellitus and chronic kidney disease.}, author={Almquist T and Mobarrez F and Jacobson SH and Wallén H and Hjemdahl P}, journal={Nephrol Dial Transplant}, volume={31}, number={6}, pages={944-52}}
